title: Dream2.Home.Start
body:
Harvest looks good this year
"Yeah, it does..."
"You think it'll be enough to keep the banks off of us?"
We'll see how grain prices go
they could always change the interest rates again too
"Our family's next in line for, you know..."
What do they call it? Labor Transfer?
"I hate that's what they call it"
"It's enslavement. It's actually enslavement"
It's not like we can go anywhere else
Can't get work without birthing papers
and the banks always have a copy
"...."
"I think I want to run anyway"
"Beats sitting around waiting to get snatched up"
We won't know until after the harvest
and having one less set of hands is not going to help
"I know"
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
